profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

NPC Building and Renovations Limited is a fully licensed Renovation Company. Meeting the needs of clients is our goal. We are pleased to provide personalized service, custom designs and work one-on-one with all our clients to ensure that the final product is just as they envisioned. Our professional workers will work diligently to ensure the quality of our work.

profile:
With a minimum 2 year Warranty, we at 310-RENO know how to design and build lasting results and lasting relationships with each of our highly respected clients.
 
Our focus is on Custom Basement Renovation projects, Kitchen renovations, Basement Finishing, Bathroom Renovation and Bathroom Remodeling, Home Additions, Second Story Additions, Rear Additions, Home Extensions and Rear Extensions.
 
We provide custom marble and tile install services as our marble and tile setters are highly skilled and detail oriented. We are the all inclusive General Contractor who will take care of all your design and general contracting needs.

Fine Finishes Design Inc. is a premier design and decorating firm serving the Greater Toronto area since 1997. 

We have a well earned reputation for attention to detail and professionalism in residential and commercial design.  Fine Finishes Design Inc. works closely with their clients and places special emphasis on understanding their unique needs, tastes and budget.  
Andrea Colman, the Principal Designer and Creative Director of Fine Finishes Design Inc. oversees each project personally ensuring the highest quality service.

Andrea graduated with the highest honours in the CIDC Design Program and is considered to be one of the best designers in the greater Toronto area.

Andrea is one of the founding members of The Benjamin Moore Painting and Decorating Services in North America and has sat on the Advisory Council for Benjamin Moore’s Painting and Decorating Services Canada.

profile:
Nick's Developments is an innovative, full-service design/build/ construction firm based in Toronto, specializing in residential clients across the GTA. With decades of construction management experience on a wide variety of residential projects, we offer a strong design aesthetic, invaluable insight, vast resources, and craftsman that exceed client expectations.

Strong leadership and communication skills are the essential components necessary to navigate a construction project from concept to completion. Our extensive knowledge of all trade areas involved in both new construction and sophisticated renovations have proven invaluable to our company and our clients. Our recognition of the importance of scheduling cost control and quality control underlies and defines our successful completion of many challenging projects on time and within budget.
name: Nick's Developments

profile:
Modular Home Additions has developed a revolutionary concept using sophisticated computer software and building techniques. In just days, a second storey addition or new home, custom designed to your needs, can be built. All structural building parts are designed and built in a climate controlled environment. This enables us to have a high quality level and build all year round without leaving your house vulnerable to weather conditions. There is minimal noise, dust and no mess.
Combining technology with excellent service, achieving your dreams is easier, faster and affordable. Using factory built components can save you up to 30% compared to conventional methods. And best of all, you are able to stay in your home during renovations without being inconvenienced. Our accurate quotation software ensures no hidden costs. This one-stop approach to renovating is a wise choice amongst many alternatives and gives you the optimum value for your home.

Patio Enclosures has been building and creating beautiful living spaces since 1966. We have had the opportunity to transform many dreams into reality by designing rooms where you can relax and your children can safely play. We have enjoyed being a part of homeowners’ lives and strive to continue to provide our customers with the best technology on the market.

This dedication and care has made Patio Enclosures the largest manufacturer and installer of Sunrooms, Solariums and Conservatories in the industry. As an award winning company, we take great pride in every new room or addition we produce. Patio Enclosures products are distributed to  branches, franchises and dealers to provide you quick service at a competitive price.

All of our Sunrooms, Solariums, Additions and Conservatories are designed and custom-manufactured in our factory. As a NARI certified remodeler, we work to make sure every product you receive from Patio Enclosures is the best quality and fit for your home. If your design requires special attention, one of our engineers will work closely with you to create and design a Sunroom, Solarium, Traditional Addition or Conservatory that works with your home, lifestyle and budget.
products: TRADITIONAL ADDITIONS | THREE SEASON SUNROOMS | FOUR SEASON SUNROOMS | SOLARIUMS | WHOLE FLOOR RENOVATIONS | WINDOWS & DOORS | BASEMENTS | CONSERVATORIES | ARCHITECTURAL DESIGN & PERMIT PLANS
services: Don't just renovate your home, rejuvenate your life with a Patio Enclosures brand sunroom, addition, solarium, renovation or any construction project. From modest to extravagant, our rooms are custom-designed and custom-manufactured to meet your needs, budget and lifestyle.
name: Complete Home Construction Inc

profile:
At Mignon Interiors, we Design, get your Permits and Approvals, and Build your Home.
Do you need a Full Home Renovation, New Construction, Extension, Addition, Second Floor, Basement or Kitchen Renovation?

We begin with a Free Consultation in your Home. We want to learn about your current layout, design and structural features. We also want to know what you do and don't like about your home. Next our Designer will do an extensive brainstorming of possible designs, colour tones and layouts. She will put together a proposal and recommend what styles go well with your home and preferences. The planning and design is the most important part of a home renovation. 

Next we have a Contractor with over 40 years of construction experience in Toronto. He will look at all the structural changes, interior and exterior finishes etc. to calculate your construction cost. We work with you and make adjustments until you are satisfied with the scope of your renovation and budget. Everything is on paper, we do not touch your home until you give us your approval. 

We then put together a rigid timeline and schedule. Materials are sourced and contractors begin their work. To keep your money safe, we want to minimize up front deposits and pay progress payments only after each stage is completed. Our goal is to keep you informed throughout the entire process, whilst allowing you to focus on your daily work, family and social life.

Welcome to Mignon Interiors, where we stand by our reputation. We are dedicated to giving you a positive experience and make sure you will be thrilled with your Brand New Home.
services:
Full Home Renovation
Interior Design
New Construction
Home Renovation
Additions and Extensions
Basement Renovation
Kitchen Renovation

profile:
"My Prestigious Home" is where you need to be...

MPH has been a leader in major renovations and custom home construction since 2007. From concept to completion, we take a client’s vision and make it a reality through a comprehensive process to ensure the finished product exceeds expectations. Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your project and better to say, your investment. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, MPH is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.

Our vast professional experience, skilled expertise and attention to details enable us to offer you innovative solutions, competitive pricing and the ability to meet milestones. We appreciate how much your project means to you. That’s why we approach each project with professionalism, integrity and adaptability while maintaining open communication with you every step of the way.
We pride ourselves in Home additions, renovations, custom home building, commercial renovations, condominium renovations and design and build projects.

We understand custom homes and renovations are amongst the most important investment to people in their lifetime. So whether it be a new architecturally designed or inspired home, or a renovation and extension of your existing home, you can be guaranteed that MPH is most definitely the qualified team for your project.

We have had the opportunity to transform your dreams into reality by designing rooms where you can relax and your children can safely play. We have enjoyed being a part of homeowners’ lives and strive to continue to provide our customers with the best technology on the market. We have completed literally hundreds of renovations since our inception. 

Please view our website at http://MyPrestigiousHome.com to view images of some of our projects.

Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.

Our projects range from building new custom homes, home additions and extensions, condominium renovations, architectural design and permit, structural engineering, commercial renovations, rear addition, second floor addition, basement underpinning, custom kitchen and bathrooms, residential renovations and finally we design and build everything. We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship.

With 2 year Warranty, we at MPH know how to design and build lasting results and lasting relationships with each of our highly respected clients.

Our focus is on Custom projects such as custom Kitchen renovations, Basement Finishing and underpinning, Bathroom Renovation and Bathroom Remodeling, Home Additions, Second Story Additions, Rear Additions, Home Extensions and Rear Extensions, commercial renovations, office renovation, architectural drawings, permit and etc. We work with some of the top architects, interior designers, engineers and sub-trades in Toronto. We are the all inclusive General Contractor who will take care of all your design and general contracting needs.

MPH is an innovative, full service design/build/construction firm based in Toronto, specializing in residential clients across the GTA. With decades of construction management experience on a wide variety of residential projects, we offer a strong design aesthetic, invaluable insight, vast resources and craftsman that exceed client expectations.

Strong leadership and communication skills are the essential components necessary to navigate a construction project from concept to completion. Our extensive knowledge of all trade areas involved in both new construction and sophisticated renovations have proven invaluable to our company and our clients. Our recognition of the importance of scheduling, cost control, and quality control underlies and defines our successful completion of many challenging projects on time and within budget.

There are many different reasons to work with us: to make room for a growing family, to improve layout or increase the resale value of your property! Our team of professionals offer customers design and build counselling along with skilled trades and top discounts, on top brands.

There is no substitute for experience. Join the list of satisfied clients! In the end the quality of your project depends on who you hire. When you hire us, you do so because of our company’s reputation, our track record with past clients and our commitment to new ones.

Contact us for a free "No Pressure" estimate and let us help you take the first step to completing your project. Advice is always free. Remember, we are talking about Professional Advice from Skilled Engineer.
Our areas of servings are in Toronto, Beaches, Etobicoke, Mississauga, Richmond hill, Markham, Foresthill, Royal York, Vaughan, Woodbridge, East York, West end, Central Toronto, North York, & Downtown Toronto.

"My Prestigious Home"
Impact on Community, Providing Quality

profile:
Founded in 2009, TC Homes is a Luxury Custom Home Builder specializing in development amongst the most prominent areas within the Greater Toronto Area and the GTA.

TC Homes is proud to work with the highly experienced architects and designers of this industry.

TC Homes has two main purposes: to bring quality and safety to life and to exceed customers’ expectations by building every element to perfection.

TC Homes Contracting has provided diverse services for clients and architects throughout the GTA region for more than 20 years. As a full service contractor, we have the skills and experience to manage, build and support a wide variety of project types and client needs; we strive to provide excellent services …
service_area: We serve all of GTA including, Toronto, Markham, NorthYork, Richmondhill, Mississauga, Scarborough, Vaughn, Brampton, Woodbidge, Whitby...
services:
At any scale, TC Homes presents each client with superior service and attention throughout the project. 

Services include:

new construction 
renovation/tenant improvements 
project management 
construction management 
bobcat excavation
estimating and scheduling 
in-house services 
renovations 
From beginning to end, effective construction management is essential to any project. The Project Manager coordinates all aspects of the project and is the primary contact for all needs and concerns for the duration of the project. TC Homes has a commitment to the project and team and employs pre-construction value engineering, savings through negotiated projects, and project-specific construction strategy, while presenting and maintaining the construction schedule with expert project coordination.
The In-House Service Division provides TC Homes clients with continued service after construction is complete. This includes:

facilities management 
monthly or yearly inspections 
cost analysis for budgets 
hourly rates for in-house work 
third party negotiations for other services 
24-hour emergency service 
commercial painting 
exotic coatings 
occupied painting
name: TC Homes

profile:
The In Tech House Design Corporation has a 10 – year history of providing design and building services for various aspects of Canadian Construction Market. ITHD is a construction company that will help you to select the right project delivery method from the many options available. Once this project framework is in place ITHD will customize the construction plan to fulfill your project needs, focusing on important factors such as budget, schedule, and your desired level of involvement. Using our equally unique set of skills and processes, we plan, build, and renovate facilities on behalf of our clients. While we are very proud of work we do, we consider strong relationships to be the true measures of our success. 

Our experience allows our experts to critically assess any issues which may arise throughout the design and construction processes, and contributes to our ability to creatively resolve problems and prevent delays during the course of each project.

Our skilled team of architects, designers and craftsmen share a commitment to customer service, made manifest through seven core principles: Courtesy, Accountability, Integrity in Design, Quality Craftsmanship, Communication, Cleanliness and Accessibility. 

This commitment has helped us build a broad base of loyal clients who continue to refer family and friends. We thank you for considering Jash Design & Build, and invite you to tour our online gallery by clicking on our website link.

profile:
Residential/Commercial renovation and handyman services for any project.

Our Services are available:
- Anywhere in the GTA
- Anytime of the day or week
- Fully Insured (up to for $5,000,000) and Licensed 
- Always Punctual, Detailed and Professional

Our Past Projects Included:
- Full Home Renovation
- Kitchen and Bathroom Remodelling
- Millwork and Carpentry
- Waterproofing and Tiling
- Plumbing (Performed by licensed Plumber)
- Electrical Work (Performed by licensed Electrician)
- Drywall, Taping and Sanding
- Framing and Insulation
- Painting and Staining
- HVAC
- Landscaping
- Other 

Please contact us for a free estimate and chance to discuss your project details. You will receive a detailed breakdown of the costs, timelines and a walk through all aspects of any job. The estimate will cost you nothing, but it will give you a chance to assess our qualifications better than any add can.

Looking forward to hearing from you.
